attributes.action: scrap the higgh prices of prescriptions for people who have to have medication for ailments that are on-going and not one off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to stop the over charging of patients for perscriptions. Perscriptions are currently £7.20 each. For many people that have to stay on medication along time, this is breaking the bank. They do not want to be constantly worrying about how much their medication costs when they obviously have more important things to worry about than perscriptions that break the bank.
